en: Use Arrow Keys to move and jump.
Looks like they need some parts… Maybe I can find them.
Now just to find a battery…
I can’t find one. I should give them mine… to give them a chance to live.
This is... a second chance I didn't think I'd have to leave this place.
Why am I still alive? I should give them back my battery...
I hope they knew why I brought them back.
Hi there... Thanks for taking care of me.
